fulltext:
Resume
VO THI NGAN HUYEN
Email:  Mobile: 
SUMMARY:
Nearly 7 years working in the software companies such as Elca, Nash Tech and TMA Solutions in the
different business projects of FINMA, Amdocs, Avaya, I had strong experience in software testing
methodologies and process with a wide variety of projects in Web Application/System testing.
Expertise in analyzing documents and identifying, creating the required Test Plan, Test Scenarios.
Extensive Experience in software testing which includes Functional Testing, Regression Testing,
System Testing, GUI Testing, Integration Testing.
Report and tracking defect to managers using Tools like Quality Center and Jira.
Experience in working onsite directly with clients.
Besides that, I am critical thinking, responsible, dependable in work as well as interpersonal and team
work spirit in a proactive environment with friendly and effective communication.
CAREER HISTORY AND EXPERIENCE:
Nov 2016 – Now:       BA cum QC – ELCA Vietnam
FINMA & Federal Department of Foreign Affairs 
FINMA is Switzerland’s independent financial-markets regulator
Responsibilities 

Quickly understand the project's business

Business know-how support: organize the business transfer, 
business sharing, analyze/reproduce customer’s issues.

Clarify unclear or inconsistent points in requirement 
Reviews requirements, specifications, business processes and 
recommendations related to the proposed solution.

Create/ Review test cases, Test plan
Plan and estimate testing activities

Develop test cases, prepare test data, and execute the test 
manually

Report to project manager & Retain business knowledge by 
organizing documents
Technologies used in project

Environment: Windows; Browser: IE, Edge, Chrome,
Firefox

Database: SQL server

GUI, UX, Data modeling, Report, Security

Tool: GIT, Jira
Achievements

Plan, estimate and report on work activities with PM

Work closely with the developers’ team to meet client 
expectations
Page:  1  of  4
Resume

Document and analyze the required information and data.

Communicate effectively with internal teams and external 
clients to deliver the expected applications 

Testing and delivery the high-quality application to 
customers on time

Familiar with Agile IT methodology
Jun.2014 – May 2016:
Senior Engineer – Harvey Nash
Amdocs ODC – Telkom (South Africa) and Globe (Philippines)
Amdocs is the market leader in customer experience software solutions
and services for the world’s largest communications, entertainment and
media service providers such as AT&T, EE, Vodafone, Globe…
TIS-Technology Integration Services is the huge part of Amdocs
professional services unit; approach to the testing lifecycle delivers a
complete lifecycle solution from strategic planning to execution and
metrics. Our services scope covers business processes, operational & non-
functional processes as well as end-to-end, end user testing & customer
experience testing.
Responsibilities

Developing test scenarios for all supported area and execute TCs

Review test cases and test scenarios with Internal and Clients

Transfer knowledge to Teammate, new members about Business
Process and System 

Consolidate and Report the defects/ issue/ testing status daily and
weekly
Technologies used in project

Environment: Windows, Linux

Database: SQL server

CES – Customer Experience Solutions: CRM, OMS…

Tool: Putty, FPT, QTP , HP Quality Center
Achievements

On-site working for business meeting, supporting with customers

Vast Experience in designing test plan, test case and execution 

Good at capturing, analyzing and resolving problem

Experience in Enterprise system with many domains: CRM, OMS,
EPC, ACC, AM, Billing…

Familiar with Scrum methodology
Feb.2014 – Jun.2014:
Senior Engineer – TMA Solutions
Page  2  of  4
Resume
B179 Conference Phone Project
B179 Conference phone is the strategy product of Avaya about conference
phone area. It uses SIP protocol to communicate with Avaya
communication and provide the best services for conference call in many
call servers: Aura, IPO and CS1K 
Responsibilities

Developing test plan for all supported area and Testing

Report problems to designers

Investigate documents
Technologies used in project

Environment: Windows, Linux

Networking : 
Layer 2: VLAN, LLDP
Layer 3: IP, TCP, UDP, DHCP
Layer 4: HTTP
Network Security : HTTPS/TLS, RADIUS
Achievements

Developing test plan  test cases and  executing TCs

Install and configure Communication server

Experience in review the QA documents (test plan, feature
specification, etc.)

Experience in black-box testing: Functional Testing, Regression 
Testing, System Testing
Nov.2011 - Feb.2014  
Engineer – TMA Solutions
DECT/WIFI Project
This is the wireless project, uses DECT protocol to communicate between
handset with Avaya CM via IPBS/IPBL. 
Responsibility:
 Testing

System installation, operation and maintenance
Technologies:

Environment: Linux, Window

Technology: DECT, H323, H323 trunk, SIP trunk, PTT ( Push to
talk )
Achievements:

Build up lab, install and configure DECT systems

Troubleshoot the issues, report problems to designers

Investigate documents, compose test cases.

Support in training new members about background knowledge of
DECT system

Support issue customer and work directly with designer to support
the issue

Get a knowledge about OPENLDAP + Microsoft SQL 2008
SKILLS:

Project management
       Have the knowledge to provide a strategy, estimation and planning for project
Page  3  of  4
Resume

Critical thinking
       Research and analyse data which requires to think critically
 Dedication       
      Being continually self-investigated and improved for knowledge of new technologies
Commitment 
     Consistently accomplishing tasks on time with high responsibility
     Be willing to work on far-mission for experience cumulating and skill improvement.
Organization, time management     
      Planning, prioritizing the essentially important tasks and established the timelines.
Problem-solving      
          Analyzing, evaluating and finding out solutions to solve the issues as soon and efficiently 
as possible.
Teamwork       
      Highly dependable in work as well as good interpersonal and team work spirit in a 
proactive environment with friendly, open-minded, and cooperative qualification.


 English and Vietnamese

Communications- Electronics engineering technology
